Texts.Eng: Curious. This liquid appears to be restoring your mechs energy, rather than causing negative effects.
DANGER! Essentia Obscura is rapidly turning your mech into pudding! Get out swiftly!
DANGER! Sulphuric acid has compromised your mech plating. I suggest leaving the liquid immediately.
DANGER! This fluid is rapidly shorting out every system on board the mech. We should leave this liquid soon or risk death.
DANGER! This poisonous water seems to seep into your mechs components and cause serious issues. You should get out sooner than later.
DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!
DANGER! Your mechs servos and components are rapidly freezing within the liquid nitrogen. That isn't a good thing. Evacuate soon or you will know regret.
Now try throwing your mass around. Try to ^#FF1493;leap and ^#FF1493;stomp^reset; on the creatures ahead.

Please be aware of your mech's ^#bf2fe2;fuel^white; and ^#1d8e25;health^white; reserves, visualised respectively as the ^green;colored bars you can see above your vehicle^reset;. The ^#bf2fe2;fuel^white; will deplete over time and the ^#1d8e25;health^white; bar will deplete when the mech takes damage.
Remember, you can create a ^orange;Mech Repair tool^reset; at your ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; and upgrade it to be more effective at a ^orange;Tool Upgrade Station^reset;.

The ^#orange;Mech Tablet^reset; can help you ^orange;equip^reset; and ^orange;refuel^reset; your mech. Fuel is important, so keep your mech topped up. Dr.Akaggy will give you your Mech Tablet in a moment.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#00BFFF;cold^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#00FF00;radioactive^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#32CD32;poisonous^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#6A5ACD;electric^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#9ACD32;proto^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#A0522D;high pressure^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#FF1493;weird^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified nfor this ^#FF4500;hot^reset; environment!nDisregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.
Welcome to your new mech! Before we begin, if you want to collect the goods from the crates in front of you, exit the mech by pressing ^#FF1493;[E]^reset;. These supplies will come in handy later.
Your mech can ^#FF1493;duck by pressing ^#FF1493;[DOWN]^reset;, or ^#FF1493;sprint with a ^#FF1493;[double-tap]^reset; in the direction you are walking.

Your mech switches to a ground-movement configuration when in an environment with gravity, you can manually switch from ground-movement to flight-Mode ^#FF1493;double tapping the [UP] key^reset;. I would advise you continue to proceed in your mech.
Your mech will auto-crouch to fit into areas that it can pass, should the need arise. Such as at the top of this passage.
Zero gravity combat is a bit trickier than on flat ground. Accuracy is important, so you'll need to learn to lead your targets properly.
